name: REGISTER_APP.VBS Proxy Execution
description: Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script 'REGISTER_APP.VBS' to register a VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application.
false_positives: Legitimate usage of the script. Always investigate what's being registered to confirm if it's benign
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\\register_app.vbs* AND process.command_line:*\-register*)`
